title: Exclusive: In heated meeting, India seeks tougher action from U.S. tech giants on fake news - Reuters India
content: Exclusive: In heated meeting, India seeks tougher action from U.S. tech giants on fake news  Reuters India
description: Indian officials have held heated discussions with Google, Twitter and Facebook for not proactively removing what they described as fake news on their platforms, sources told Reuters, the government's latest altercation with Big Tech.
